message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $85. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $78, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
